tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He is a very  nice and experienced doctor. My Baby has been sick with loose motion and was discharging it pretty frequently,4times in an hour.so we grew very worried and it was about 10 P.M.
So we called him .Then he video-called us within 2minutes and checked our baby thoroughly..her tongue , tummy ,back  and her movement.if she is dehydrated.after that he prescribed the medicines.he said,she will get well soon and loose motion stopped after administering her medicine in a few hours. I highly recommend him to everyone.He is very friendly,he explains everything very clearly and lets his visiter know what should be next treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Ajay is very friendly and extremely helpful. Being a first time parent we were not sure of many things. He explained everything very calmly even a small small things. He is always available on whatsapp and respond on every question early or late. I highly recommend him  for every parents specially new parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My daughter got infected from me and got fever during the covid -19 3rd wave.

We were worried and immediately booked an appointment with the doctor and when we first spoke with him. He has explained everything in detail and with patience.

We highly recommend the doctor. We need more such doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am very impressed by the diagnosis of the allergy that my child is having .He explained the problem in detail and prescribed accurate medicines . For safe site he was asked to do some test , but diagnosis was same as before the test .Doctor is very friendly and available

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: it was the best experience I had with Dr. Tiwari over practo. He very well listened to the issue, checked my child virtually,, explained me the possible reasons for the persisting issue and all precautions to take.He even helped me understand the use of medicine being given to my kid and followed up to check my kids health. **** ********* *** ********* ****** ******. I highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor has excellent way to talk to kids to extract problems they feel, within 2-3 mins children are friendly talking to him.

  We have been to many of reputed docs before reaching dr. A.K tiwari but the amount of time spent with kids and parents both to understand the situation is almost 30-40 mins wasn't seen anywhere.

We have never experienced a re-visit for the same issue after following his prescriptions.

The doctor tracks child status throughout the treatment period if required and is responsive to parents queries.
